description:
"I've never done anal before," Joshua said. "Just don't have a desire."

So, Joshua is one of those straight guys who isn't obsessed with fucking a girl up the ass. He also says he's "100% straight" so we might have to enjoy this one all by himself!

He's 21 and works for a delivery service.

In high school, he was star of the wrestling team.

"I was a wrestler," he said. "135 pounds, and my coach just... he loved me, and he had me drop down more weight classes so I looked even sexier."

Hmmm, OK, not sure about that coach, but as Joshua put it, "I looked pretty good in those Spandex uniforms!"
title: Joshua
